original_title: The Lesbian Adventures of Satine Phoenix
overview: There is no one quite like Satine Phoenix. Artist, porn star, fetish model, and real life lover of director Nica Noelle, Satine inspires lust in all who meet her. In this special documentary, director Noelle explores the many sides of the girl she calls "my Muse."
title: The Lesbian Adventures of Satine Phoenix
